answers.answer: Hi!Actually the beneficial effect starts soon after you stop drinking. Appreciable fall in triglycerides will be seen within a week, if alcoholic hepatitis was the cause of high triglycerides. If other causes like a diet rich in fat, hereditary factors, diabetes, thyroid disorders etc are the cause, then these would need to be looked into. Take care!
